text: Zdzisław Myrda (29 January 1951 – 6 July 2020) was a Polish basketball player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1980 Summer Olympics. He was born in Siedliska, Poland. Myrda died on 6 July 2020 at the age of 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Polish basketball players
title: Zdzisław Myrda
